markdownRemark.excerpt: Introduction In today's digital landscape, Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) has become a critical requirement for ensuring the security of…

frontmatter.title: Heterogeneous MFA Enablement in a Financial Services Client
frontmatter.subtitle: Security is not a product, but a process. - Bruce Schneier
frontmatter.excerpt: Recently, I had the opportunity to deliver MFA solutions for a client across three distinct platforms. Each project presented unique challenges, but the ultimate goal was the same - to enhance the security of the client's data and applications.
frontmatter.author: Mark Roxberry
